Name: Work Trip
About the game: Introduction You're on your way to work when suddenly a tree falls over your car and smashes it broke. Your goal is to find someone to help you with fixing the car and getting you back on the road. You will travel through beautiful zones designed to please your eye, in these zones you'll find different NPC's who will help you progress through the main story of the game. The gameplay is easy, fun and relaxing with an easing soundscape. Features The game has a lot of sweet features to keep you busy! Main story with quests and different NPC's placed in few unique worlds littered with secrets & achievements. The game has been tested to remove and fix all game breaking bugs to make your experience better. Enjoy your trip through the giant mystical forest and find out what it has to show!
